frontmatter.title: Skype for Business Online connector decomission
frontmatter.description: After Microsoft announced they'll decomission Skype for Business Online module, I'm sharing the instruction of how to replace it with new module efficiently.

frontmatter.title: CsTeamsUpdateManagementPolicy cmdlets
frontmatter.description: New set of cmdlets has appeared in Skype for Business Online/Teams PowerShell. Cmdlets are Get/Set/New-CsTeamsUpdateManagementPolicy.

frontmatter.title: Host Skype for Business meetings like a professional
frontmatter.description: In that post I'd like to share some of the best practices for organizing meetings.
